[DQC.IFRS.0102.9546] Cash flows from (used in) investing activities with a value of -712,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Cash flows from (used in) investing activities, continuing operations and Cash flows from (used in) investing activities, discontinued operations ( -698,000,000 + -8,000,000 ) with a value of -706,000,000.
These values should be equal.
